checkpoint.name: Autoclaved linen & dressing material are used for procedure
Autoclaving of delivery kits is done as per protocols
checkpoint.meansOfVerification: Ask staff about temperature, pressure and time. Ask staff about method, concentration and contact time required for chemical sterilization

checkpoint.name: There is a procedure to ensure the traceability of sterilized packs & their storage
checkpoint.meansOfVerification: Sterile packs are kept in clean, dust free, moist free environment.

checkpoint.name: Equipment and instruments are sterilized after each use as per requirement
checkpoint.meansOfVerification: Autoclaving/HLD/Chemical Sterilization

checkpoint.name: Facility layout ensures separation of routes for clean and dirty items
Availability of cleaning agent as per requirement
checkpoint.meansOfVerification: Hospital grade phenyl, disinfectant detergent solution

checkpoint.name: Availability of disinfectant as per requirement
checkpoint.meansOfVerification: Chlorine solution, Glutaraldehyde

checkpoint.name: Standard practice of mopping and scrubbing are followed & three bucket system is followed
checkpoint.meansOfVerification: Unidirectional mopping from inside out. Cleaning protocols are available / displayed

checkpoint.name: Cleaning of surfaces of labour room using disinfectant
checkpoint.meansOfVerification: Daily surface cleaning Carbolic acid/ phenol(2%), commercially available products

checkpoint.name: Cleaning of patient care area with detergent solution
checkpoint.meansOfVerification: Staff is trained for preparing cleaning solution as per standard procedure

checkpoint.name: Cleaning equipment like broom are not used in patient care areas
checkpoint.meansOfVerification: Any cleaning equipment leading to dispersion of dust particles in air should be avoided

checkpoint.name: Spill management protocols are implemented
checkpoint.meansOfVerification: spill management kit staff training, protocol displayed

checkpoint.name: There is procedure for immunization & medical check up of the staff
checkpoint.meansOfVerification: Hepatitis B, Tetanus Toxic etc

checkpoint.name: Surface and environment samples are taken for microbiological surveillance
checkpoint.meansOfVerification: Swab are taken from infection prone surfaces

checkpoint.name: Regular monitoring of infection control practices
checkpoint.meansOfVerification: Hand washing and infection control audits done at periodic intervals

checkpoint.name: Personal protective kit for delivering HIV patients
checkpoint.meansOfVerification: Cap & Mask, protective Eye cover, Disposable apron

checkpoint.name: Availability of disposable gown/ Apron
checkpoint.meansOfVerification:
Check if staff is using PPEs
Ask staff if they have adequate supply

checkpoint.name: Heavy duty gloves and gum boats for housekeeping staff
checkpoint.meansOfVerification:
Check if staff is using PPEs
Ask staff if they have adequate supply 
Verify with the stock / Expenditure register

checkpoint.meansOfVerification:
Check if staff is using PPEs
Ask staff if they have adequate supply

checkpoint.name: Availability of shoe cover
checkpoint.meansOfVerification:
Ask staff if they have adequate supply

checkpoint.name: Use of elbow length gloves for obstetrical purpose
checkpoint.meansOfVerification:
Check if staff is using PPEs

checkpoint.name: Availability of Masks , caps and protective eye cover
checkpoint.meansOfVerification:
Check if staff is using PPEs
Ask staff if they have adequate supply

checkpoint.name: Entry to the labour Room is only after change of shoes and wearing Mask & Cap
Compliance to correct method of wearing and removing the gloves
No reuse of disposable gloves, Masks, caps and aprons.
Availability of colour coded bins at point of waste generation
Segregation of Anatomical and soiled waste in Yellow Bin
Availability of Non chlorinated plastic colour coded plastic bags
Segregation of infected plastic waste in red bin
Display of work instructions for segregation and handling of Biomedical waste
There is no mixing of infectious and general waste
Availability of post exposure prophylaxis
checkpoint.meansOfVerification: Ask if available. Where it is stored and who is in charge of that. Alos check PEP issuance register

checkpoint.name: Availability of puncture proof box
checkpoint.meansOfVerification: Check availability of white colour puncture proof Sharp container at point of use

checkpoint.name: Staff knows what to do in condition of needle stick injury
checkpoint.meansOfVerification: Staff knows what to do in case of shape injury. Whom to report. See if any reporting has been done

checkpoint.name: Glass sharps are disposed in Blue coded Cardbox
Availability of functional needle cutters
checkpoint.meansOfVerification: See if it has been used or just lying idle

checkpoint.name: Check bins are not overfilled
Disinfection of liquid waste before disposal
checkpoint.meansOfVerification: Through Local Disinfection

checkpoint.name: Check Shaving is not done during part preparation/delivery cases
Availability Use of Antiseptic Solutions
checkpoint.meansOfVerification: like before giving IM/IV injection, drawing blood, putting Intravenous and urinary catheter &Proper cleaning of perineal area before procedure with antisepsis

checkpoint.name: Availability of elbow operated taps & Hand washing sink is wide and deep enough to prevent splashing and retention of water
Availability of antiseptic soap with soap dish/ liquid antiseptic with dispenser.
checkpoint.meansOfVerification: Check for availability/ Ask staff if the supply is adequate and uninterrupted. Availability of Alcohol based Hand rub

checkpoint.name: Availability of hand washing with running Water Facility at Point of Use
checkpoint.meansOfVerification: Check for availability of wash basin near the point of use Ask to Open the tap. Ask Staff water supply is regular

checkpoint.name: Display of Hand washing Instruction at Point of Use
checkpoint.meansOfVerification: Prominently displayed above the hand washing facility , preferably in Local language

checkpoint.name: Adherence to 6 steps of Hand washing
checkpoint.meansOfVerification: Ask of demonstration & check staff awareness about when to wash the hands

checkpoint.name: Departmental checklist are used for monitoring and quality assurance
checkpoint.meansOfVerification:
Daily Checklist to check labour room preparedness and cleanliness is used for quality assurance 
Staff is designated for filling and monitoring of these checklists

checkpoint.name: There is system daily round by matron/hospital manager/ hospital superintendent/ Hospital Manager/ Matron in charge for monitoring of services
checkpoint.meansOfVerification:
Facility Incharge should visit at least twice in a week. OBG Incharge should visit Labour room atleast twice a day, Matron/Nursing supervisor should visit at once in each shift 
Findings/instructions during the visits are recorded

checkpoint.name: There is a designated departmental nodal person for coordinating Quality Assurance activities
Process mapping of critical processes done
Processes are improved & implemented
Non value adding activities are identified
Check if SMART Quality Objectives have framed
checkpoint.meansOfVerification: Check short term valid quality objectivities have been framed addressing key quality issues in each department and cores services. Check if these objectives are Specific, Measurable, Attainable, Relevant and Time Bound.

checkpoint.name: Check of staff is aware of Mission , Values, Quality Policy and objectives
checkpoint.meansOfVerification: Interview with staff for their awareness. Check if Mission Statement, Core Values and Quality Policy is displayed prominently in local language at Key Points

checkpoint.name: Standard operating procedure for department has been prepared and approved
Current version of SOP are available with process owner
clinical protocols for Intrapartum care and Management of obstetric emergency are Displayed
checkpoint.meansOfVerification: AMSTL, Preparing Partograph, , PPH, Eclampsia, Infection control,

checkpoint.name: Don'ts/ Harmful Activities are Displayed at labour Room
checkpoint.meansOfVerification:
1. No routine enema
2. No routine shaving
3. No routine induction/augmentation of labour
4. No place for routine suctioning of the baby
5. No pulling of the baby. 
6. No routine episiotomy
7. No fundal pressure
8. No immediate cord cutting
9. No immediate bathing of the newborn
10. No routine resuscitation on warmed

checkpoint.name: Clinical protocols on Newborn Care are displayed
checkpoint.meansOfVerification: Essential Newborn Care, New born resuscitation

checkpoint.name: Department has documented procedure for specific processes to the department
checkpoint.meansOfVerification: Intrapartum care, Essential Newborn Care, Immediate postpartum care

checkpoint.name: Department has documented procedure for support services & facility management.
Department has documented procedure for general patient care processes
checkpoint.meansOfVerification: Triage, Assessment, registration, admission shifting

checkpoint.name: Department has documented procedure for data collection, analysis & use for improvement
Department has documented procedure for safety & risk management
Department has documented procedure for infection control & bio medical waste management
Department has documented procedure for quality management & improvement
Department has documented procedure for ensuring patients rights including consent, privacy, confidentiality & entitlement
Check Staff is a aware of relevant part of SOPs
Check periodic assessment of medication and patient care safety risk is done using defined checklist periodically
checkpoint.meansOfVerification: Verify with the records. A comprehensive risk assessment of all clinical processes should be done using pre define criteria at least once in three month.

checkpoint.name: Non Compliance are enumerated and recorded
Maternal Death Audits are conducted on Monthly Basis
Near Miss Audits are conducted on Monthly basis
Internal assessment is done at periodic interval
Referral Audits are conducted on Monthly Basis
Neonatal Death Audits are conducted on Monthly Basis
Action plan prepared
Check correction & corrective actions are taken
checkpoint.meansOfVerification: PDCA

checkpoint.name: Advance quality improvement method
checkpoint.meansOfVerification: Six sigma, lean.

checkpoint.name: Basic quality improvement method
checkpoint.meansOfVerification: PDCA & 5S

checkpoint.name: 7 basic tools of Quality
checkpoint.meansOfVerification: Minimum 2 applicable tools are used in each department

checkpoint.name: Percentage newborn breastfed within 1 hour of birth
No. of cases of Neonatal asphyxia

Percentage of antenatal corticosteroid administration in case of preterm labour

cases managed

births

Availability of C-section services
checkpoint.meansOfVerification: Both elective and emergency C-sections

checkpoint.name: Management of MTP and ectopic
checkpoint.meansOfVerification: Surgical management

checkpoint.name: Availability of Post partum sterilization services
checkpoint.meansOfVerification: tubal ligation

checkpoint.name: Availability of New born resuscitation& essential new born care
checkpoint.meansOfVerification: Functional New born Care Corner

checkpoint.name: Availability of point of care diagnostic test
checkpoint.meansOfVerification: Blood gas analyser, Glucometer, RDK , blood group

checkpoint.name: Availability of Maternity HDU/ICU services in the facility
Availability of Emergency OT services as and even when required
OT Services are available 24X7
All surgical procedure are free of cost for JSSK beneficiaries
checkpoint.meansOfVerification: free drugs, consumables , blood

checkpoint.name: OT is easily accessible
checkpoint.meansOfVerification: Availability of Wheel chair or stretcher for easy Access to the ward, Door is wide enough for passage of trolley and staff.

checkpoint.name: Patient Records are kept at secure place beyond access to general staff/visitors
checkpoint.meansOfVerification: In drawers/almirah; preferably with lock facility.

checkpoint.name: Behaviour of staff is empathetic and courteous
checkpoint.meansOfVerification: Ask patients and their relatives.

checkpoint.name: Patients are properly draped/covered before and after procedure
checkpoint.meansOfVerification: Look how patients are transferred from ward to OT and vice-versa.

checkpoint.name: Consent is taken for surgical procedures
checkpoint.meansOfVerification: written consent with details of the procedure with potentials risks and complication. Should be signed by patient/next of kin and one witness

checkpoint.name: Separate consent is taken for Anaesthesia procedure
checkpoint.meansOfVerification: written consent with details of the anaesthesia with potentials risks and complication. Should be signed by patient/next of kin and one witness

checkpoint.name: Availability of departmental signage's
checkpoint.meansOfVerification: (Numbering, main department and internal sectional signage for restricted area are displayed

checkpoint.name: Information regarding services are displayed
checkpoint.meansOfVerification: Display doctor/ Nurse on duty and updated OT schedule displayed

checkpoint.name: Availability of Nursing staff
checkpoint.meansOfVerification: As per patient load , at least two

checkpoint.name: Availability of OT technician
checkpoint.meansOfVerification: One per shift.

checkpoint.name: Availability of OT attendant/assistant & TSSU assistant
checkpoint.meansOfVerification: 1 each

checkpoint.name: Availability of anaesthetist
checkpoint.meansOfVerification: At least One

checkpoint.name: Availability of Obs. & Gynae Surgeon
checkpoint.meansOfVerification: 100 beds 2, 200 beds-3, 3oo beds-4, 400 beds-5 and 500 beds-6

checkpoint.name: Floors of the OT are non slippery and even
checkpoint.meansOfVerification: made of anti-skid & Epoxy flooring

checkpoint.name: Windows/ ventilators if any in the OT are intact and sealed
checkpoint.meansOfVerification: No broken glass, gap or cracks in window/ventilator.

checkpoint.name: Walls and floor of the OT covered with joint less tiles
checkpoint.meansOfVerification: curved edges or use of Epoxy

checkpoint.name: Non structural components are properly secured
checkpoint.meansOfVerification: Check for fixtures and furniture like cupboards, cabinets, and heavy equipment , hanging objects are properly fastened and secured

checkpoint.name: Availability of three phase electricity supply
checkpoint.meansOfVerification: Check electricity bill or Power Distribution Board. Meter have three wires coming out (with one neutral).

checkpoint.name: OT does not have temporary connections and loosely hanging wires
checkpoint.meansOfVerification: No extension cord or multi-plugs

checkpoint.name: Availability of muscle relaxants drugs
checkpoint.meansOfVerification: Succinylcholine, Vecuronium, Mivacurlum, Tubocarine as per EDL/state guidelines

checkpoint.name: Availability of medical gases
checkpoint.meansOfVerification: Availability of Oxygen Cylinders / Piped Gas supply, Nitrogen

checkpoint.name: Availability of other drugs
checkpoint.meansOfVerification: Antibiotics, Analgesics, Uterotonic drugs, IV fluids and anithypertensive drugs as per EDL.

checkpoint.name: Availability of drugs for reversal of Anaesthesia.
checkpoint.meansOfVerification: Neostigmine, Naloxone, Flumazenil, Sugammadex-as per EDL/State guidelines.

checkpoint.name: Availability of drugs for local anaesthesia
checkpoint.meansOfVerification: Procaine, lidocaine (lignocaine), bupivacaine, Xylocaine jelly

checkpoint.name: Availability of opioid analgesics.
checkpoint.meansOfVerification: Fentanyl, Sufentanil, Morphine, Buprenorphine, Levorphanol, Methadone-As per EDL/State guidelines.

checkpoint.name: Availability of drugs for general anaesthesia
checkpoint.meansOfVerification: Inhaled agents-Halothane, nitrous oxide. Injectables: Barbiturates (Theopental, Thiamylal, methohexital-as per EDL), Benzodiazepines (diazepam, Lorazepam, Midazolam), Ketamine, Etomidate, Propofol as per EDL /State guidelines.

checkpoint.name: Availability of personal protective equipments
checkpoint.meansOfVerification: adeauate quantity of gloves, caps, masks, aprons and goggles.

checkpoint.name: Availability of Antiseptic Solutions
checkpoint.meansOfVerification: In adequate quantity as per load.

checkpoint.name: Availability of syringes and IV Sets
checkpoint.meansOfVerification: In adequate quantity as per load.

checkpoint.name: Availability of consumables for new born care
checkpoint.meansOfVerification: Cord Clamp, mucous sucker, airway, NG Tube, Suction catheter, IV cannula, paed IV set.

checkpoint.name: Availability of dressings and Sanitary pads
checkpoint.meansOfVerification: Adequate quanity of sterile pads, gauze, and bandages as per load.

checkpoint.name: Emergency drug tray is maintained in OT in pre and post operative room
checkpoint.meansOfVerification: Every tray is labelled with name and number of drugs and consumables along with their date of expiry.

checkpoint.name: Unidirectional flow of goods and services
checkpoint.meansOfVerification: .Services are designed in a way, that there is no criss cross in moment of sterile & no sterile supplies & equipment etc.

checkpoint.name: Demarcated Clean Zone
checkpoint.meansOfVerification: Doctor's and Nurse's room, Anaesthesia room, equipment room, emergency exit.

checkpoint.name: Demarcated sterile Zone
checkpoint.meansOfVerification: Operating room, Scrub station, Anaesthesia station,

checkpoint.name: Availability of Scrub Area
checkpoint.meansOfVerification: Height around 96 cm with elbow taps/sensors, both hot and cold water available. Sink is deep and wide enough to avoid spoiling.

checkpoint.name: Availability of earmarked area for new born Corner
checkpoint.meansOfVerification: Functional warmer, resuscitation apparatus, suction/mucous extractor, O2 cylinder, weighing scale, clock and sterile gloves.

checkpoint.name: Availability of Changing Rooms
checkpoint.meansOfVerification: Separate for male and females

checkpoint.name: Availability of demarcated Pre & post Operative Room /area
checkpoint.meansOfVerification: Can be in a single room with a partition.

checkpoint.name: Availability of store
checkpoint.meansOfVerification: located in protective zone.

checkpoint.name: Demarcated Protective Zone
checkpoint.meansOfVerification: Reception, waiting area, stretcher/Trolley bay, Pre and post operative rooms,

checkpoint.name: Availability of TSSU
checkpoint.meansOfVerification: Demarcated space for dirty and sterile equipment/linen.

checkpoint.name: Demarcated disposal Zone
checkpoint.meansOfVerification: Disposal corridor, janitor closet

checkpoint.name: Availability of functional telephone and Intercom Services
checkpoint.meansOfVerification: Intercom should be connected to key areas like ICU, Blood Bank, SNCU, Accident and emergency, wards, Administration, Lab etc.

checkpoint.name: OT tables are available as per load
checkpoint.meansOfVerification:
Hydraulic OT Tables 
As per case load at least two

checkpoint.name: Corridors are wide enough for movement of trolleys
checkpoint.meansOfVerification: 7 to 10 feet, door should be 7 feet height & width 1.2 meter

checkpoint.name: Adequate space for accommodating surgical load
checkpoint.meansOfVerification: General OT around 40 Square metres.

checkpoint.name: Training on OT Management
checkpoint.meansOfVerification: OT scheduling, maintenance, Fumigation, Surveillance, equipment-operation and maintenance, infection control, surgical procedures and emergency protocols.

checkpoint.name: Biomedical Waste Management& Infection control and hand hygiene ,Patient safety
checkpoint.meansOfVerification: To all category of staff. At the time of induction and once in a year.

checkpoint.name: Training on Quality Management
checkpoint.meansOfVerification: Assessment, action planning, PDCA, 5S & use of checklist

checkpoint.name: Advance Life support
checkpoint.meansOfVerification: ALS and CPR by recognized agency to all category of staff.

checkpoint.name: Check for competence assessment is done at least once in a year
checkpoint.meansOfVerification: Check for records of competence assessment including filled checklist, scoring and grading . Verify with staff for actual competence assessment done

checkpoint.name: Availability of Point of care diagnostic instruments
checkpoint.meansOfVerification: Glucometer, HIV rapid diagnostic kit, USG and Blood gas analyser

checkpoint.name: Availability of Fixtures
checkpoint.meansOfVerification: Tray for monitors, Electrical panel for anaesthesia machine with minimum 6 electrical sockets ( 2= 15 amp power point) cardiac monitor etc, panel with outlet for Oxygen and vacuum, X ray view box.

checkpoint.name: Availability of functional OT light
checkpoint.meansOfVerification: Shadow less Major & Minor, Ceiling and Stand Model, Focus Lamp

checkpoint.name: Availability of attachment/ accessories with OT table
checkpoint.meansOfVerification: Hospital graded mattress , IVstand, Bed pan

checkpoint.name: Availability of functional Instruments Resuscitation
checkpoint.meansOfVerification: Ambu bag, Oxygen, Suction machine , laryngoscope scope, Defibrillator (Paediatric and adult) , LMA, ET Tube

checkpoint.name: Availability of functional anaesthesia equipment
checkpoint.meansOfVerification: Boyles apparatus, Bains Circuit or Sodalime absorbent in close circuit ,AGSS (Anaesthesia gas scavenging system)

checkpoint.name: Availability of functional General surgery equipments
checkpoint.meansOfVerification: Diathermy (Unit and Bi Polar), Cautery

checkpoint.name: Availability of functional instruments for Gynae and obstetrics
checkpoint.meansOfVerification: LSCS Set, Cervical Biopsy Set, Proctoscopy Set, Hysterectomy set, D&C Set

checkpoint.name: Availability of functional equipments/ Instruments for New Born Care
checkpoint.meansOfVerification: Radiant warmer, Baby tray with Two pre warmed towels/sheets for wrapping the baby, mucus extractor, bag and mask (0 &1 no.), sterilized thread for cord/cord clamp, nasogastric tube

checkpoint.name: Operation Table with Trendelenburg type
checkpoint.meansOfVerification: OT Table hydraulic major and OT table hydraulic minor

checkpoint.name: Availability of equipment for storage of sterilized items
checkpoint.meansOfVerification: Instrument cabinet and racks for storage of sterile items

checkpoint.name: Availability of equipment for storage for drugs
checkpoint.meansOfVerification: Refrigerator, Crash cart/Drug trolley, instrument trolley, dressing trolley

checkpoint.name: Availability of functional Equipment &Instruments for examination & Monitoring
checkpoint.meansOfVerification: BP apparatus, Thermometer, Pulse Oxy meter, Multiparameter , PV Set, torch

checkpoint.name: Availability of equipments for cleaning
checkpoint.meansOfVerification: Three Bucket system for mopping, Separate mops for patient care area and circulation area duster, waste trolley, Deck brush

checkpoint.name: Availability of equipment for TSSU
checkpoint.meansOfVerification: Autoclave Horizontal & Vertical, Steriliser Big & Small

checkpoint.name: OT has installed fire Extinguisher that is either Class A , Class B, C type or ABC type
checkpoint.meansOfVerification: Check the expiry date for fire extinguishers are displayed on each extinguisher as well as due date for next refilling is clearly mentioned

checkpoint.name: Check for staff competencies for operating fire extinguisher and what to do in case of fire
checkpoint.meansOfVerification: staff should be able to demonstrate how to open the extinguisher and operate it. PASS (Pull the pin, Aim at the base of fire, Sway from side to side)

checkpoint.name: OT has sufficient fire exit to permit safe escape to its occupant at time of fire
checkpoint.meansOfVerification: Check the fire exits are clearly visible and routes to reach exit are clearly marked

checkpoint.name: Doctor, nursing staff and support staff adhere to their respective dress code
checkpoint.meansOfVerification: Check staff is wearing dress as per their dress code.

checkpoint.name: Department maintained stock and expenditure register of drugs and consumables
checkpoint.meansOfVerification: check that records are regularly updated

checkpoint.name: There is practice of calculating and maintaining buffer stock
checkpoint.meansOfVerification: Buffer stock are Extra Supplies to ensure that there are no stock out if there is unexpected increase in demand or delay in receiving supplies

checkpoint.name: There is established system of timely indenting of consumables and drugs
checkpoint.meansOfVerification:
Stock level are daily updated
Requisition are timely placed

checkpoint.name: Temperature of refrigerators are kept as per storage requirement and records are maintained
checkpoint.meansOfVerification: Check for temperature charts are maintained and updated periodically

checkpoint.name: Empty and filled cylinders are labelled & kept separately
checkpoint.meansOfVerification: Each cylinder is provided with a checklist & flow meter and key for opening the cylinder

checkpoint.name: Drugs are stored in containers/tray/crash cart and are labelled
checkpoint.meansOfVerification: Away from direct sunlight and temperature is maintained as per instructions of manufacturer.

checkpoint.name: Expiry dates' are maintained at emergency drug tray
checkpoint.meansOfVerification: Records for expiry and near expiry drugs are maintained for drug stored at department

checkpoint.name: No expiry drug found
checkpoint.meansOfVerification: No partial compliance.

checkpoint.name: There is procedure for replenishing drug tray /crash cart
checkpoint.meansOfVerification: There is no stock out of drugs

checkpoint.name: Narcotic ,psychotropic & Anaesthetic agents are kept in lock and key
checkpoint.meansOfVerification: under direct supervision of anaesthetist

checkpoint.name: Availability of Centralized /local piped Oxygen, nitrogen and vacuum supply
checkpoint.meansOfVerification: cylinders are provided with trolleys to prevent fall and injuries.

checkpoint.name: Availability of power back up in OT
checkpoint.meansOfVerification: 2 tier backup with UPS

checkpoint.name: Availability of UPS & Emergency light
checkpoint.meansOfVerification: check their functionality.

checkpoint.name: Availability of 24x7 running and potable water
checkpoint.meansOfVerification: Availability of Hot water supply

checkpoint.name: Warning light outside the OT is switched on when OT is functional
checkpoint.meansOfVerification: Only persons required in OT are allowed to enter the OT

checkpoint.name: Security arrangement at OT
checkpoint.meansOfVerification: Signage, security guard, CCTV camera

checkpoint.name: Adequate Illumination at OT table
checkpoint.meansOfVerification: 40,00 Lux at place of incision &100000 lux at bottom of incision

checkpoint.name: Temperature & humidity is maintained and record of same is kept
checkpoint.meansOfVerification: 20-25OC, ICU has functional room thermometer and temperature is regularly maintained. 50-60% humidity

checkpoint.name: OT Table are intact and without rust
checkpoint.meansOfVerification: Mattresses are intact and clean
